channel.title: film on Passion Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in film on Passion Portfolio

item.title: THE CHOICE
item.description: We make lots of choices a day and a day. When we wake up, we will to choose what to wear today or what to eat for breakfast. When we go to college, we have to choose which on is best for us. When we choose something sounds bizzard, sounds ridiculous, will we dare to make this decision, will we dare to dream it…

item.title: Message in Bottle
item.description: Can we save our environment, make our life better, or you may change a person’s life even you can not imagine.

item.title: Ballet Spiderman
item.description: The motion is from CMU library motion capture data and the character model is from Free3D.com.
